comment.author: 94518815@N05
comment._content:
From right to left
Grace Falke Tugwell, Tugwell´s wife very active in the nutrition programs after the war
Jesús T. Piñero, Governor of PR from 1946-1948, and member of the Caribbean Commission
Rexford Guy Tugwell, He was member of the Caribbean Commission, Company, Governor of Puerto Rico 1941-1946, part of President Roosevelt´s Brain Trust
Carlos Prío Socarrás,  President of Cuba 1948-1952 and wife
Can´t identify the one at the left.
